attributes.action: reduce tax on table wines with alcohol levels of 12.5% or less, so as to encourage the production, sale and consumption of wines with more moderate alcoholic strength.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We also demand that future taxes on alcohol be focused on super-strength beers, lagers and ciders and alcopops, to discourage ‘binge’ and nuisance drinking in Britain

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce tax on table wines with alcohol levels of 12.5% or less, so as to encourage the production, sale and consumption of wines with more moderate alcoholic strength."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22645


Prime Minister's Office
